title: Relaxing Mercure Canberra Escape with Daily Breakfast & Parking
description:
Immerse yourself in Australia's intimate and cultured capital city with a stylish lakeside stay at a beautifully appointed property near Lake Ginninderra. Make use of the hotel's fitness centre or savour a meal at Selection Bistro, located in the adjoining Canberra Labor Club.

Venture out to discover the city's iconic landmarks, including the Australian War Memorial and the National Gallery, or indulge in retail therapy at world-class shopping centres. For nature enthusiasts, scenic national parks beckon, while sports aficionados will appreciate proximity to major stadiums.
offer_address: 59 Cameron Avenue, Belconnen, Australia Capital Territory 2617, Australia
